items.title: Face Reading: Profile people immediately.  (Basic Level)

items.headline: Acquire the skill to read people quickly
objectives_summary: How to read faces. Identify the features, lines, shapes. learn to profile people within minutes
You are able to tell if a person is more rational or empathetic, identify people from the shape of the eye brows, height of ears, size of mouth etc
This is not a fortune-telling workshop, but based on the new science of epigenetics. It reveals the person that they are.
